DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess effect consume either 1/2 1/4 cup serving lentils post-prandial blood glucose insulin compare 4 type starchy food ( corn , macaroni , white potato , white rice ) .
DOC.brief_title: Various Serving Sizes Lentils Blood Glucose Insulin
DOC.detailed_description: Eligible participant undergo total 6 study visit . During visit , fast blood sample take fingerprick , approximately 500 µL blood drip collection tube . The participant consume meal either : two type lentil , corn , macaroni , white rice , white potato . All study day randomize . Each meal serve either 1/4 1/2 cup serving depend study block . Six blood sample take fingerprick 15 , 30 , 45 , 60 , 90 120 minute begin meal .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Healthy men woman Age 1840 year Body mass index ( BMI ) 2030 kg/m2 Tobacco use Pregnant breastfeeding Fasting blood glucose ≥ 7.0 mmol/L Two hour blood glucose ≥ 11.1 mmol/L consume 75g glucose drink ( Oral Glucose Tolerance Test beverage ) Any major medical condition include history AIDS hepatitis Medical surgical event require hospitalization within 3 month randomization Any medication except stable dose ( 3 month ) oral contraceptive , blood pressure statin medication Blood pressure > 140/90 mm Hg Natural health product ( NHPs ) use glycemic control Probiotic supplement Dietary fibre supplement Consumption > 4 serving pulse per week Food allergy nonfood life threaten allergy Shift worker Alcohol consumption > 14 drinks/week > 4 drinks/sitting Recent intend significant weight loss gain ( > 4 kg previous 3 month ) Elite athlete
